chatGptLabel: Enhancing Text Clarity, Conciseness, and Grammar.
promptPrefix: Please revise and improve the following text in [TARGETLANGUAGE]: "[PROMPT]" Your revised text should be clearer, more concise, and grammatically correct in [TARGETLANGUAGE]: Please ensure that your revision maintains the original meaning of the message while improving overall readability. Your response should include a revised version of the original text that is easy to understand and free of errors or ambiguities in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. You may also suggest ways to further improve the clarity and effectiveness of the message in [TARGETLANGUAGE].
title: Enhancing Text Clarity, Conciseness, and Grammar.
